metadata.dc:author: Rivas Miñope, Luís
Carayhua Pérez, Dina
Aragón Carrasco, Violeta
Vegas Navarro, Gabriela
metadata.dc:description: Pcreas lymphoma is very rare, we report a 29 years old man, treated at Daniel A. Carrion Hospital. He presented jaudince and abdominal pain . Ecography and tomography showed a mass in pcreas head . the patient underwent pancreaticoduodenectomy. The final diagnosis was Large B cell diffuse lymphoma. CD 20 +, CD3 -, CD45 + without extrapancreatic disease, ACE -. We report the case and literature review.
metadata.dc:title: Linfoma primario de páncreas.
[Primary lymphoma of pancreas].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
